page.title: 12NEW HOUSING
page.content: Oakdene Park is 4 miles east of Inverness.There are 171 houses and about half of them are sold already.(June '85). There are six different types of houses. 2 bed semi-det bungalow Â£28,895 to Â£26,535. 2 bed mid terr villa Â£26,695 to Â£24,315. 2 bed + box semi-det villa Â£30,595 to Â£28,025. 2 bed + box det villa Â£40,050 to Â£38,580 3 bed det villa Â£43,895 to Â£42,335 3 bed det villa Â£44,095 to Â£42,475 The site will take 3 years to build and sell.It takes 12 weeks from the date of selling to the date of occupation.After the foundations have been laid,the timber frame of the house is erected and weatherproofed in 4 hours.
